Posts.Content: Msdede wrote: I am sorry, I do not mean to complain, but this is ridiculous. I had posted before explaining that I had a surgical biopsy done on July 7th because I had microcalcifications. It was benign but I have ADH. Was told by surgeon that I needed to see an oncologist, he was going to send my report to gyn and she would call me back with a referral to one. I ended up calling her back on 8/19 because I had not heard from her yet. She did not realize she was supposed to call me back; she thought the surgeon had given me referral. Told me to call oncologist to make appt, and she would fax over my report. I waited until the next day to make sure the report got there to call oncologist for appt. When I called the oncologist, the receptionist said they received my report and the dr would look at it and she would call me back to make an appt. Yesterday was a week. I called her back today. They said they did not have my phone number to call me back. AAUUGH! She made an appt for me for sept 11th, then she asked what type of insurance I had, guess what, they do not accept it. She then told me to call my gyn back to get a name of another oncologist to see. So...I called my gyn's office, explained what happened and they are going to get back to me because.... she is on vacation today and all of next week. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Frustrated Msdede awb

Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2008 08:13PM Msdede wrote: Thank you, I will wait it out a little longer, seems all I have done for past 2 months was mammograms, talk to dr's, and surgery, I could use the break.
Posts.Title: Don't know what to do Msdede Msdede

Posts.Content: Msdede wrote: I had a surgical biopsy on July 7th, I found out on the 16th it was not cancer, but that I have ADH and would need to go to an oncologist to be put on medication, possibly Tamoxifen.  My surgeon said he would send his report and referral to oncologist to my GYN and primary and they would call me. It has now been 2 weeks and still have not heard anything from anyone.  What should I do?  Am I just being impatient? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Don't know what to do Msdede Msdede

Posts.Content: Aug 27, 2008 09:12PM Msdede wrote: Ok, well I am back to waiting. I finally called surgeon to see if my report was sent to my dr, it was, back in July. I called dr's office and was told they would talk to the dr. and get back to me. She called the next day apologizing, she didn't realize she was suppose to call me, she misinterpreted the report saying she was suppose to give me a referral, she thought the surgeon did. Told me she would fax over my report to oncologist. So...I waited for the following day to call the oncologists office (to give her time to send it) to make an appointment, told them my dr was faxing over my report. Well, the receptionist said she received the report and the dr would take a look at it and get back to me, she said to give her a couple of days. It has been a week.
Posts.Title: Don't know what to do Msdede Msdede
